description: [``botocore``] In this release, we have added the ability to bind events to component level actions.

[``botocore``] This release adds tracing for App Runner services with X-Ray using AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry. New APIs: CreateObservabilityConfiguration, DescribeObservabilityConfiguration, ListObservabilityConfigurations, and DeleteObservabilityConfiguration. Updated APIs: CreateService and UpdateService.
[``botocore``] Added API support that allows customers to create GPU-enabled WorkSpaces using EC2 G4dn instances.
